lines:
1956

Kar

Columbia Universtin

New York

Bew York New Yook Cafy

Jan. 3. 1914. 
My dear Mr. Steams :

I thank you even so 
much for your Kindness in helping me 
Your letters with no inclosed check 
for $350 + $10. have just been 
recind and I am returnen here 
wirts recupts for in two.

to leave 
New Yock City an in 6th of thes 
months. 2 schedule to sail a 
the 13th of Jan. from Seattle.

Gand bye Mr. Sleans, we well 
dee

future 
game in some near 
Time in Amrica or abroad.

Yuiers Lencene fremd

S... Luk.

Am

gain

to

the
raw: 1956 Kar Columbia Universtin New York Bew York New Yook Cafy Jan. 3. 1914. My dear Mr. Steams : I thank you even so much for your Kindness in helping me Your letters with no inclosed check for $350 + $10. have just been recind and I am returnen here wirts recupts for in two. to leave New Yock City an in 6th of thes months. 2 schedule to sail a the 13th of Jan. from Seattle. Gand bye Mr. Sleans, we well dee future game in some near Time in Amrica or abroad. Yuiers Lencene fremd S... Luk. Am gain to the

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter to Alfred Stearns from S.C. Luk with thanks for Stearns' help and the checks of $350 and $10. He states he will leave New York on January 6th and expresses his desire to see Stearns in the future.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
